website_summaries.verdict: The timeless look of the Vans SK8-Hi is so impressive that Vans decided to revive it to cater to the modern consumers. The SK8-Hi Core Classics carried the original, stylish guise and stayed faithful in delivering superb comfort and ample ankle support. However, Vans failed to fine-tune this model's insufficient arch support, which rubbed a star out of its overall ranking. Overall, while this shoe doesn't offer any modern elements, its supportive and stylish sensibilities are still on point.
pros: The Vans SK8-Hi Core Classics runs true to size
Buyers can choose from multiple colorways available in the market
This shoe has an affordable price point
Many reviewers shared that this pair looks pleasant with any attire
A large percentage of the respondents revealed that this footwear is very comfortable
Few buyers cited that this kick is a great all around sneaker
Some of them shared that they use their Vans SK8-Hi Core Classics for biking, outdoor playing, enjoying the basketball, and for cruising the city streets
Most of the respondents highly recommended this footwear to their friends
A buyer shared that this kick is easy to break-in
Few retro heads applauded the throwback vibe of this kick
A handful of users praised the ample ankle support this shoe provides
A couple of wearers noted that this pair has durable sole and suede upper
Some buyers cited about the flexibility of this kick that gives them superb board feel
cons: Few reviewers complained that the Vans SK8-Hi Core Classics has insufficient arch support

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, stylish, durable and lightweight. Takes a few walks to get used to the shoe but apart from that fantastic. Can always trust vans for a quality product

customer_reviews.title: Look good, fit well
customer_reviews.text: Look good, fit well, despite being for sixteen year old girl. Better price than other retailers and delivered on the day expected.

customer_reviews.title: VANS .. YEESSSSSS FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Not had any Vans for years... why .. getting old .. but went for them and what a good move, they are way better than Converse ,comfortable roomy very well made and really good looking

customer_reviews.title: what i always recommend with branded items
customer_reviews.text: well, i know i'm a 5.5. in VANs, so these do fit as expected. usually a 6 mind! what i always recommend with branded items: go to the shop, try it on, order online for cheaper ;-)

customer_reviews.title: ... don't know why I keep buying Vans because I hate how flat the bottom is -- not good for ...

customer_reviews.title: Vans boots
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best boot ever made . I love this boot . Buy a pair and you won’t regret it . They last forever. Vans have done a great job .

customer_reviews.title: cool shoe
customer_reviews.text: Had these now for 8 months. They're a solid shoe, and they've just started to get holes in the backs of their soles which is doubtless as much to do with my gait as with the design of the shoe. If you aren't good with Vans sizes, I take a converse 10, and these are slightly too big. If you're a Converse ten, a VANS 9.5 is your best bet!

customer_reviews.title: Looked very tatty after just a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: Looked very tatty after just a couple of weeks, think we'll stick with converse.

customer_reviews.title: New best (foot) friend
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are really comfortable. The fit is true to size but a bit wide as they are unisex (nothing a front-of-shoe insole wont fix for me) so if you have a really narrow foot beware. The colour goes with everything. Love them!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Returned instantly

customer_reviews.title: these are absolutely awesome; so very comfy

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality considering im heavy footed

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very true to size and comfortable. Usually I'm worried about ordering shoes online but I was not let down. Wore them straight away for a long day of shopping and they were great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great on! Can be worn with literally everything! Fast shipping and super cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came within expected time and quality was as brilliant as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Feryn

customer_reviews.title: Absolute bargain !!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes offered as worn once or twice with light scuff marks but hard pressed to find any !!absolute bargain !! Thrilled to bits!!

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I would certainly recommend this product. Quality is brilliant, very hard-wearing and waterproof. They're also very comfortable. I really like how the perforations on the toe-caps allow a fresh breeze feel without allowing water to get in. They're also very comfortable. Delivery was very good, I ordered mine through Amazon Prime on a Saturday night and received them by Monday around 10:00am. The price was very credible too as they're £58 - £60 in shops.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Shute

customer_reviews.title: Vans addict approved.
customer_reviews.text: The only shoes I wear are Vans. Being that I have small feet and unwilling with the humiliation of wearing kids shoes. Vans fit perfect, I know my size then grab them in every colour and style! Love these high tops. Perfect with leggings and an oversized tee.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Another great shoe from Vans!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes! Fit absolutely perfectly and after 3 months of owning them, i can say they have become my favourite shoes in my collections, based on both comfort and style! Worn on a daily basis and they seem to be coping with this really well, no tears, rips or major degradation in the soles of the shoes. Colour combination is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vans
customer_reviews.text: They were brought for someone else. So I'm unable to comment
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend, who has a pair already but they have lasted him years. Accidentally bought a size too small but he says they fit much better than his usual size. He says they’re very comfy and he wears them a lot, his previous pair were very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, bad quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Size 9 was more like a size 8. Very narrow fit too. And the outer edge of shoes are coming apart already! No way of contacting this seller!
customer_reviews.author: lee

product_meta.title: Vans Unisex Adults’ Sk8-hi Classic Suede/Canvas Trainers
product_meta.description: The lightweight uppers feature lace-up design, the Vans Sk8-Hi features a cushioned under-heel for comfort, a reinforced toe to withstand wear and tear, and a padded collar with support and flexibility. The iconic Vans waffle outsole provides added grip.
